name: DigiClef
overview:
DigiClef is a brand new way of getting your hands on your favourite guitar tabs via your mobile phone.

DigiClef helps you become a better guitarist by displaying legal professional quality tabs (including sheet music notation) with touch-sensitive controls that allow you to adjust the tempo of the music easily; meaning you can learn the music at your own pace whenever and wherever you are.

DigiClef Electronic Guitar Tab Songbooks display professional quality tabs with interactive features such as:

  • playback at the original tempo
  • easily adjustable tempo via slider or tap tempo control
  • follows original musical navigation (v1.1 and above)
  • custom loops by double tapping start and end bars (v1.1 and above)
  • score position indicator that allows quick navigation by tapping or dragging (v1.1 and above)
  • swipe to navigate through the score and tap to select a measure
  • lyrics
